Now the second part of the claim: They finished second in their final two listed conferences. The last two seasons listed are 2011-12 and 2012-13. Looking at these, both have 'finish' as 2nd. So that part is true.

Putting it together: The Grizzlies never finished first during those years but did finish second in the last two conferences (2011-12 and 2012-13). Therefore, the claim seems to be TRUE.

I should also consider if there are any other seasons where they might have finished second towards the end. For example, before 2000, were there any finishes? No, because the Vancouver Grizzlies didn't make it past 7th place until Memphis took over in 2001-02, which had a finish of 7th.
